H0.text: Which famous cowboy was created by George W. Trendle. Roy Rogers

H1.text: Which famous cowboy was created by George W. Trendle. Hopalong Cassidy

H2.text: Which famous cowboy was created by George W. Trendle. The Cisco Kid

H3.text: Which famous cowboy was created by George W. Trendle. Lone Ranger

A4.text: The Cisco Kid was created by O. Henry.

A5.text: The Caballero's Way was written by O. Henry in 1907.

A6.text: Trendle claimed credit as the creator of the Lone Ranger.

A7.text: The result was The Lone Ranger, which began broadcasting January 30, 1933, on WXYZ and the seven other stations of the Michigan Regional Network.
